frontMatter.title: Muse Pi Pro (Spacemit K1 / M1) – My First Real RISC-V Experience
frontMatter.author: Amrut Prabhu
frontMatter.summary: Hands-on review of the Muse Pi Pro RISC-V SBC with the SpacemiT K1 SoC – benchmarks, thermals, NVMe and Wi-Fi 6 performance, plus my honest thoughts for developers.
